title: Exploratory Data Analysis with Pandas
description: Analyzed a dataset from Kaggle, performing exploratory data analysis using Pandas and Matplotlib. Focused on data cleaning, handling missing values, and basic statistical analysis.

title: Regression Analysis for Housing Prices
description: Built a linear regression model to predict housing prices based on features such as square footage, number of bedrooms, and location. Evaluated model performance using mean squared error.

title: Classification of Email Spam
description: Developed a Naive Bayes classifier to categorize emails as spam or not spam. Applied text preprocessing techniques, such as tokenization and TF-IDF vectorization.

title: Data Visualization of Movie Ratings
description: Created interactive visualizations of movie ratings over time using Plotly and Dash. Focused on understanding trends and distribution of ratings in a dataset of 1000+ movies.

title: Predicting Student Performance
description: Used machine learning algorithms like logistic regression and decision trees to predict student performance in exams based on demographic and behavioral data.

title: Clustering Analysis of Customer Segments
description: Applied k-means clustering to segment customers based on purchasing behavior. Analyzed the results to identify distinct customer groups for targeted marketing.

title: Text Classification with NLP Techniques
description: Built a text classification model using Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques such as word embeddings and recurrent neural networks to categorize movie reviews as positive or negative.

title: Data Cleaning and Feature Engineering for Financial Dataset
description: Performed extensive data cleaning and feature engineering on a financial dataset, handling missing values, normalizing numerical features, and creating new features to improve model accuracy.

title: Analyzing Traffic Patterns with Data Science
description: Analyzed traffic data to predict peak traffic hours and suggest potential improvements using regression analysis and time series forecasting.

title: Building a Recommendation System
description: Developed a collaborative filtering recommendation system to suggest products based on user behavior. Implemented using Python and the Surprise library.

title: Visualizing Global Health Indicators
description: Created visualizations to display key global health indicators, such as life expectancy and vaccination rates, across different countries using Python's Matplotlib and Seaborn.

title: Time Series Analysis of Stock Prices
description: Applied time series analysis techniques to forecast stock prices based on historical data. Used ARIMA models and evaluated prediction accuracy using RMSE.
